ygData.subject: jewelcraft trivial
ygData.msgSnippet: I have started a new enchanter on the newest server.  I just to level 10 last night and began working on my jewelcraft skill.  I put my 20 skill points in and
ygData.messageBody:
I have started a new enchanter on the newest server. I just to level 10
last night and began working on my jewelcraft skill. I put my 20 skill
points in and began working on malachite rings. I failed 5 times, no biggie
expected something like that, but then I made one and got a trivial message.
I then made a lapis necklace and got the same trivial message. I failed on
a malachite and got a skill raise.

Something screwy going on.

I did a petition and the guide had me do a feedback as well. Supposedly
there were no changes to jewelcraft. Buyer Beware ).

Valore
